PackageOracle.name: DA_INDIVIDUAL
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_INDIVIDUAL
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.56.361511000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,birth_dt IN DATE
,gender_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,given_nm IN VARCHAR2
,middle_nm IN VARCHAR2
,family_nm IN VARCHAR2
,name_prefix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,name_suffix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,birth_dt IN DATE
,gender_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,given_nm IN VARCHAR2
,middle_nm IN VARCHAR2
,family_nm IN VARCHAR2
,name_prefix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,name_suffix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,individual_id IN NUMBER
,birth_dt IN DATE
,gender_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,given_nm IN VARCHAR2
,middle_nm IN VARCHAR2
,family_nm IN VARCHAR2
,name_prefix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,name_suffix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,individual_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_individual;

body.name: DA_INDIVIDUAL
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_INDIVIDUAL
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.56.373590000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,birth_dt IN DATE
,gender_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,given_nm IN VARCHAR2
,middle_nm IN VARCHAR2
,family_nm IN VARCHAR2
,name_prefix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,name_suffix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_individual.add(fx), parms=' || birth_dt || '|' || gender_type_cd || '|' || given_nm || '|' || middle_nm || '|' || family_nm || '|' || name_prefix_txt || '|' || name_suffix_txt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_individual a
(
a.individual_id
,a.birth_dt
,a.gender_type_cd
,a.given_nm
,a.middle_nm
,a.family_nm
,a.name_prefix_txt
,a.name_suffix_txt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_individual_id.NEXTVAL
,add.birth_dt
,add.gender_type_cd
,add.given_nm
,add.middle_nm
,add.family_nm
,add.name_prefix_txt
,add.name_suffix_txt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.individual_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_individual.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,birth_dt IN DATE
,gender_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,given_nm IN VARCHAR2
,middle_nm IN VARCHAR2
,family_nm IN VARCHAR2
,name_prefix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,name_suffix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_individual.add, parms=' || birth_dt || '|' || gender_type_cd || '|' || given_nm || '|' || middle_nm || '|' || family_nm || '|' || name_prefix_txt || '|' || name_suffix_txt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_individual a
(
a.individual_id
,a.birth_dt
,a.gender_type_cd
,a.given_nm
,a.middle_nm
,a.family_nm
,a.name_prefix_txt
,a.name_suffix_txt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_individual_id.NEXTVAL
,add.birth_dt
,add.gender_type_cd
,add.given_nm
,add.middle_nm
,add.family_nm
,add.name_prefix_txt
,add.name_suffix_txt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_individual.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,individual_id IN NUMBER
,birth_dt IN DATE
,gender_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,given_nm IN VARCHAR2
,middle_nm IN VARCHAR2
,family_nm IN VARCHAR2
,name_prefix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,name_suffix_txt IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_individual.add, parms=' || individual_id || '|' || birth_dt || '|' || gender_type_cd || '|' || given_nm || '|' || middle_nm || '|' || family_nm || '|' || name_prefix_txt || '|' || name_suffix_txt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_individual a
(
a.individual_id
,a.birth_dt
,a.gender_type_cd
,a.given_nm
,a.middle_nm
,a.family_nm
,a.name_prefix_txt
,a.name_suffix_txt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.individual_id
,add.birth_dt
,add.gender_type_cd
,add.given_nm
,add.middle_nm
,add.family_nm
,add.name_prefix_txt
,add.name_suffix_txt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_individual.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,individual_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_individual.del, parms=' || individual_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_individual a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.individual_id = del.individual_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_individual.del');

END del;

END da_individual;
